messages.message: Given the above workaround ^ is working for everyone, I see the ecr-login secrets were created by Sean 2 years back, I think the keys may just need rotation possibly because of Sean's account being deactivated causing the keys set by him to not work anymore.
I can share the keys which are not working, ~let me know I'll DM them!~ DM'd @Abhinav the expired secrets.

Here are the credentials used by crafting -- we need the AWS ones fixed

```cs/mfichman‚ùØ cat env-local-secrets.json
{
  "base": {
    "aws_access_key_id": "AKIARG3DSRG36HQDUJM6",
    "aws_secret_access_key": "REDACTED",
    "google_drive_client_id": "666216188190-jl78oda7ab2u9lqsaj4p107aug37jhbd.apps.googleusercontent.com",
    "google_drive_client_secret": "REDACTED",
    "db_params": "",
    "installm_api_key": "REDACTED",
    "metronome_api_key": "REDACTED",
    "oidc_client_id": "666216188190-jl78oda7ab2u9lqsaj4p107aug37jhbd.apps.googleusercontent.com",
    "oidc_client_secret": "REDACTED",
    "oidc_discovery_url": "https://accounts.google.com/.well-known/openid-configuration",
    "openai_api_key": "REDACTED",
    "session_secret_key": "REDACTED",
    "stripe_publishable_key": "pk_test_51MtZvdG94q149KmCLZXzNpYO0I70bm60qSF82MRgTXGn3BuC5NJWLZdSf2Jss9pB8uCIP7LAOXQhDBHTx5Jm2EZg00cZSH0WFY",
    "stripe_secret_key": "REDACTED",
    "msft_ocr_api_key": "REDACTED",
    "msft_ocr_endpoint_v3": "https://instabaseinternalocr.cognitiveservices.azure.com",
    "gcloud_api_key": "REDACTED",
    "ses_secret_access_key": "REDACTED",
    "ses_access_key_id": "AKIARG3DSRG3YUJI5THH"
  }```
I think ses_access_key_id and aws_access_key_id are the main ones

@Abhinav If you want an IAM role for reference, maybe the PowerUserAccess.

https://instabase.slack.com/archives/C05L87V014J/p1753073546111569

Based on my findings, I think ecr-login uses a different set of creds than the ones specified above, the key_id is `AKIAX7YFPI7G6FOEZIZO` which is being used in the ecr-login script. Basically whatever is reads from `/var/run/sandbox/fs/secrets/owner/ecr-login` . This is what has stopped working I believe.
